SEARCH:
模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.controller

类 AudioManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
Manages the audio functionalities of the game, including background music and sound effects. Provides methods for initializing, playing, pausing, and managing background music and hover sounds.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明

    private static boolean
    backgroundMusicEnabled
    A flag that indicates whether the background music is enabled.
    private static javafx.scene.media.AudioClip
    hoverSound
    An AudioClip instance for playing sound effects when buttons are hovered.

  • 字段详细资料

    • backgroundMusic

      private static javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer backgroundMusic
      A MediaPlayer instance for playing the background music of the game. This player is used to control the background music playback.

    • hoverSound

      private static javafx.scene.media.AudioClip hoverSound
      An AudioClip instance for playing sound effects when buttons are hovered. This clip is used to manage hover sound effects during user interactions.

    • backgroundMusicEnabled

      private static boolean backgroundMusicEnabled
      A flag that indicates whether the background music is enabled. This value controls whether the background music will be played or paused.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AudioManager

      public AudioManager()

  • 方法详细资料

    • initBackgroundMusic

      public static void initBackgroundMusic()
      Initializes the background music player if not already initialized. Loads the background music from the resources.

    • playBackgroundMusic

      public static void playBackgroundMusic()
      Plays the background music if it's enabled.

    • pauseBackgroundMusic

      public static void pauseBackgroundMusic()
      Pauses the background music if it's currently playing.

    • isBackgroundMusicPlaying

      public static boolean isBackgroundMusicPlaying()
      Checks if the background music is currently playing.
      返回:
      true if background music is playing, false otherwise.

    • initHoverSound

      public static void initHoverSound()
      Initializes the hover sound effect if not already initialized. Loads the hover sound from the resources.

    • playHoverSound

      public static void playHoverSound()
      Plays the hover sound effect. This sound is played when the user hovers over buttons or interactive elements.

    • getBackgroundMusic

      public static javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer getBackgroundMusic()
      Gets the background music MediaPlayer.
      返回:
      the background music MediaPlayer instance.

    • setBackgroundMusicEnabled

      public static void setBackgroundMusicEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the background music.
      参数:
      enabled - true to enable background music, false to disable it.

    • isBackgroundMusicEnabled

      public static boolean isBackgroundMusicEnabled()
      Checks if background music is enabled.
      返回:
      true if background music is enabled, false otherwise.
